name: Love is Blind - The Prototype
description:
This game isn't currently in a good status, I know, my English is bad, but here is the Project from Handco Games for Brackey's Game Jam II, have fun.

It has a very short Gameplay.

Me as the developer tested the game today (again), and I'm sorry for the mistakes with the text and the grammar. I hope you can understand the Voice.

Iportant Errors to know:

1. Stage, first Secure Question: Whats inside the 2. door on the left right? 2. Word is missing: Whats the name of the [Boss]?

I'm writing this now the third time, because there was a loading mistake two times, everytime it becomes shorter xD

Stop here to avoid Spoilers!

...~//GUIDE\\~...

//1. Part\\

Move to the hospital (white building at the top) go inside (mittle). Move all the way to the right top side. Move to the desk on the right. Click the top right Button, than click the lower button on the left. Here you go!

//2. Part\\

Move to the white building again, navigate to the top !left! inside. click the right button, hold "a" and if you collide with the desk hold "d" and you're done.

...~//Story\\~...

You learn about the story of Love, not the feeling, I mean this as a name. In her country war broke out and she had to fight in it. After two years she got shot in the head, thats the reason her optic nerv was cut through and she became blind. For her 19th birthday her boyfriend want to get a Prototype against blindness, he heard about in the newspaper, but it is to expensive (499 million). So he stole it from the hospital, but the doctors where looking forward, and had a copy of it, which they impooved. The prototype was to bad and Love got "addicted "of it, she wanted something bedder, so she moved on and stole the bedder Prototype, it was good enough for her,

but sometimes it won't be anymore.
